alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued April 04 at 4:03AM EDT until April 05 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one quarter to four tenths of an inch several miles inland from Lake Superior. East to southeast winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages.
